did.unittitle: Portraits of Other Writers (from and for Images of the Southern Writer by Mark Morrow)

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Mark Morrow wrote to HSA about photographing her for his book, Images of the Southern Writer, on March 2, 1981. HSA does not appear in the book. See Box 37, Folder 18 for this letter.
